channel.title: Shows half of client background
channel.description:
I was trying to get the client to load the default background image from #317 cache RuneScape.
Using this code: [code]Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().createImage(abyte0);[/code]
And this is the result I get: [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/11i0l7p.png[/img] What the fuck?
Fat Cookies Edit: Dont post shit like this again, But I will keep this because it is epic. Oh, and... [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2e2h6qs.jpg[/img]
Damn Fat Cookies editted my post
